name: SayitRight Embed
author: Moosch Media Limited

sections.description:
What this plugin does is, using shortcodes, build a pure HTML version of a SayitRight station that you can navigate through.

Features:

  • Embed a SayitRight station
  • Launch a SayitRight station within a lightbox

Included languages:

  • English
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin and unzip it.
  2. Upload the folder sayitright-embed/ to your /wp-content/plugins/ folder.
  3. Activate the plugin from your WordPress admin panel.
  4. Installation finished.
sections.changelog:
0.1.0

Fixed http/https protocol request errors

0.0.2

Fixed subdomain station issue Added a launch button shortcode

0.0.1

  • Plugin released
